tier.item: While hep was walking, hep saw a persono
climbing a hill, a mano. Then hep observed himo,
spying, the persono who was seeking peopleo.
Hep knew himo to be a Blackfooto.

Meµkwa eµpimohteµ-t, ispatinaµw waµpaht-am, eµaµmaciweµ-yit ayêsiyiniw-a, naµpeµw-a. E~kwa kitaµpam-eµw kitaµpaµkan eµkanawaµpaµkaneµhikeµ-yit ayêsiyiniw-a nanaµtawaµpam-aµyit. Kiskeµyim-eµw ahyahciyiniw-a.
While hep was walking, hep saw a persono climbing a hill, a mano. Then hep observed himo, spying, the persono who was seeking peopleo. Hep knew himo to be a Blackfooto.
